Hello, world!

Welcome to the personal website of Abigail Chiaokhiao

Welcome! Thanks for looking me up, I hope you enjoy this site as much as I did making it.

About

Info on me and this site

I use this site as a way to chronicle various projects, similar to a portfolio. I have pages dedicated to specific hobbies of mine such as coding and digital drawing. I also have a blog where I have more off-topic and more opinionated posts. I find the classroom experience to be great, but sometimes I like to learn off the beaten path if I'm not learning at the pace I'd like. For recruiters: a copy of my résumé is also linked at the top of this page.

I'm currently a 2nd-year undergraduate student at the University of Minnesota where I'm studying Bioproducts & Biosystems Engineering. This is basically materials engineering with a sustainability focus, as my goal is to improve our relationship with the environment. I am also pursuing a minor in computer science to supplement. I have STEM leadership experience through robotics and clubs, and love to promote in interest in STEM. I am interested in most scientific subjects, especially pertaining to chemistry and the environment.

Outside of school, I enjoy photography and various craft projects.
